itemdesc-buildinggadget:
For all your building needs!
Functions: Build, Exchange, Destroy(it voids)
Tool modes: Build to Me, Horizontal Line, Vertical Line, Area, Volume
Placement: On Top, Inside, Under
itemdesc-constpaste:
Optionally used by the Building Gadget to build blocks so the player can avoid keeping many different materials in inventory. Disable in mod config to force the use of the actual block type to build.

Low/Medium soil uses 1
Rock uses 5
Everything else uses 10. (TerraPreta? ... 50)
Mix Any Gravel with Lime Water in a Barrel to craft.
